contentrichtext.text: There are various groups and publications called '''Democracy Watch''' throughout the world, including: *[[Democracy Watch (Canada)]], the first organization in the world called Democracy Watch, is a monitoring and advocacy group based in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada *Democracy Watch (International), a watchdog organization based in Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA *[[Democracywatch]], a development organization in Bangladesh *''Democracy Watch'', a publication of the [[Transition Monitoring Group]] in Nigeria {{disambig}}
